蕱字的基本解释

蕱
shɑo
义未详。

蕱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shāo］
［《廣韻》所教切，去效，生。］
亦作“蕱1”。
(1)禾末。
(2)引申为小。
(3)泛指事物的末端、枝叶。
(4)米俸；廩食。
(5)朝向。
(6)赌本。
(7)藏起；偷取。
(8)副词。渐，逐渐。
(9)副词。立刻；随后；不久。
(10)副词。已经；业经。
(11)副词。刚刚；恰好；才。
(12)副词。偶然；偶尔。
(13)副词。略微；稍微。
(14)副词。很；甚。
(15)副词。只，但。
(16)副词。聊；暂且。
(17)周制指离都城三百里之地。
(18)用同“捎”。捎带。
(19)用同“艄”。船。参见“稍婆”。
(20)用同“筲”。水桶。
(21)姓。汉代有稍腾。
[②]［shào］
见“稍2息”。

蕱字的康熙字典解释
蕱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蕱字的起名意思

暂无。

蕱
Basic explanation of words
蕱
shɑo
The meaning is unclear.
蕱
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [shāo]
["Guangyun" teaches cut, de-effects, and produces. ]
Also known as "蕱1".
(1) He Mo.
(2) The extension is small.
(3) Refers to the ends, branches and leaves of things in general.
(4) Rice pie; lingering food.
(5) Orientation.
(6) Gambling capital.
(7) To hide; steal.
(8) Adverbs. Gradually, gradually.
(9) Adverbs. Immediately; subsequently; soon.
(10) Adverbs. Already;
(11) Adverbs. Just now; just right; just now.
(12) Adverbs. Accidentally; occasionally.
(13) Adverbs. Slightly; slightly.
(14) Adverbs. Very much.
(15) Adverbs. Only but.
(16) Adverbs. Chat; for the time being.
(17) Zhou Zhi refers to a place three hundred miles away from the capital.
(18) Use the same "piggyback". incidentally.
(19) Use the same as "艄". ferry. See "Shao Po".
(20) Use the same as "筲". bucket.
(21) Last name. There was a slight rise in the Han Dynasty.
[②]［shào］
See "Two Breaths".
蕱
